name: epm
description: A project manager for EAST Initiative projects.

scripts.serve: npx concurrently "npx nodemon --ignore ./client/ server/src/index.ts" "npx sass --watch client/scss/index.scss:client/_css/index.css" "npx tsc-watch -p ./client/tsconfig.json"
scripts.build: cd server && npx tsc && cd ../client && tsc && sass --no-source-map scss/index.scss:css/index.css --style=compressed && postcss css/index.css --no-map --replace --use autoprefixer

author: Sawyer Bivens
